categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Ostar-Gal was a male Kel Dor Jedi Master serving the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Great Galactic War and the ensuing Cold War with the resurgent Sith Empire.

A Force-sensitive Kel Dor, Ostar-Gal was trained in the ways of the Force by the Jedi Order, eventually attaining the rank of Jedi Master. A noted Consular and Lore Keeper, Master Ostar-Gal was the Chief Librarian of the Jedi Archives which were maintained in the Jedi Temple on Tython. He was a friend of Master Yuon Par.

Ostar-Gal can be found both on Coruscant in the Senate District and on the Carrick Station. According to the game's conversation files, Ostar-Gal was originally Gnost-Dural, a character who appeared in the Galactic Timeline videos.
